title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Charges but very slowly!!!!
message: Hey guys I have an 820-2915 that would not power up i replaced c8930 because it was shorted to ground and everything was running smoothly i Reassembled checked charging wifi mouse keys lights etc.... Everything was all good. Then she brought it back! She says it takes 10 hours to charge the macbook. In Reality it takes like 2 days to charge. There is a problem.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Charges but very slowly!!!!
message: So after speaking with louis! He politely without scolding me for reaching him through private channels ;) Mentioned that i should replace u7000 and Q7055 and hope for the best! Going to do that now and see what happens unless Duke or apre shares some insightful stuff!

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Charges but very slowly!!!!
message: So i replaced both these components... and the result is the same. Still not charging.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Charges but very slowly!!!!
message:
Was not happy with the solder job done on Q7055 after cleaning it up adding fresh solder etc... 
The board is now charging correctly... Thanks louis. If you could tell me why that worked that would be awesome!

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 Charges but very slowly!!!!
message: Next time replacing Q7055 is enough, common issue.
